## Overview

In this hands-on exercise, I learnt how to import and wrangle geospatial data using appropriate R packages.

## Getting Started

The code chunk below installs and loads sf and tidyverse into R environment.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf,tidyverse)
```

## Importing Geospatial Data

### Import Polygon Feature Data

```{r}
mpsz = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```
